videos.title: Selfish - Part 1 | LOOP SERIES | LifeKids
videos.description:
This four-week series teaches fifth and six grade students what selfishness is, why it's a problem in modern culture, and how to put God and others first.

LifeKids is the children’s ministry of Life.Church for kids birth—6th grade. We create fun, age-appropriate videos, Christ centered activities, small group connections, and family resources to partner with parents to lead children to become fully devoted followers of Christ.

videos.description:

videos.title: ToonTown: Space Station Alpha - Part 2 - LifeKids.tv
ToonTown: Book in the Attic - Part 8 - LifeKids.tv
videos.description: What draws people to the Bible after all these years? It may look old and dusty and long, maybe even boring. But when we look at the story of the Bible, we'll become fascinated with it too. We'll find it's the most complicated but simple story of all time. God has a great love for us and wants us to know Him. The Bible is the story of how He has made a way for us to have a relationship with Him. It shows us who He is, and it tells us who we are. This series will help kids connect the dots between the stories IN the Bible to see the overarching story OF the Bible. And to help kids experience this flow through history and how God's story unfolded, we'll leave kids with the same cliffhanger God's people faced too, waiting on the Savior God promised.

videos.title: ToonTown: Scoundrels - Part 1 - LifeKids.tv
videos.description: This series is all about honesty! Kids are faced with decisions about honesty every day. When they choose to lie, cheat, steal, or gossip, they are choosing not to reflect God's true nature of honesty. Being honest has lots of great positive consequences that come along with it, but the best reason to choose honesty is because God is honest.

videos.title: ToonTown: Scoundrels Learn 2 Obey - Part 4 - LifeKids.tv
videos.description:
It's the wild west and Sheriff Rusty Trusty is being put to the test! In this four-week LifeKIDS.tv series, LifeKIDS will "Learn 2 Obey" right along with the scoundrels in this little western town. We'll learn what God's Word has to say about who we need to obey and why! 

Watch full videos, bible stories and music, download coloring sheets and activity guides and more at http://lifekids.tv

videos.title: White Belt - Part 1 | LOOP SERIES | LifeKids
videos.description:
Obeying authority can be tough. But God has called us to not only obey our authorities, but to also honor and respect them. Join us this series as we learn how to honor, respect and submit to our authorities in a way that honors God!

LifeKids is the children’s ministry of Life.Church for kids birth—6th grade. We create fun, age-appropriate videos, Christ centered activities, small group connections, and family resources to partner with parents to lead children to become fully devoted followers of Christ.

videos.title: Toon Town: Weird - Part 1 - LifeKIDS.tv
videos.description:
God wants us to live like Jesus. But the more like Jesus we become, the more weird we will get. If we really want to give our lives to God, then people are going to think we're weird. The choices we make, the values we have, the way we spend our time and money, even the way we think and talk will be different from everyone else. We aren't supposed to be like the world. We are called to be different-set apart, holy. Jesus didn't die on the cross so we could go on living like everyone else. To be like Him we should be weird. 

Watch full videos, bible stories and music, download coloring sheets and activity guides and more at http://lifekids.tv !

videos.title: Day Off - Part 1 | LOOP SERIES | LifeKids
videos.description:

videos.title: Roommates - Part 1 | LOOP SERIES | LifeKids
videos.description:
In this series, Brandon is wrapped up in his locally popular web show that follows the hottest new trends. It gives him a sense of worth because people look to him for what’s cool. But when a surprise visit from his cousin Matty challenges him on what he’s living for, Brandon starts helping others and doing more with his life. He then begins to utilize his web show to promote a cause that he and Matty work on together, that gives others the opportunity to reach out to those in need.

videos.title: I Belong to God | Mr. Music's Sing-Along Vol. 1 | LifeKids
videos.description:
Sing along with Mr. Music's song from the Bible Adventure episode "Two by Two!"

I show I’m God’s friend when I obey. He helps me do what my parents and leaders say!

LYRICS

VERSE 1
I am God’s friend
Whoah-oh-oh
I am God’s friend
Whoah-oh-oh
So I will obey

Save

Spend
* Spend wisely: Proverbs 10:16

Be honest
*Proverbs 13:11; Proverbs 16:8; Proverbs 13:11

videos.description:
Snowflakes, cookies, Christmas trees, and the sound of sleigh bells—there’s a thrill in the air, can you feel it? It’s “Christmas Love”!  Sing and dance together as a family during this feel-good, goodwill kind of season. 

Gather the whole family for a “Happy Birthday, Jesus” praise party! Celebrate God’s very first Christmas gift while having a whole lot of family fun with all the songs in the LifeKids Christmas Medley album!

Amazon Music: https://go2.lc/AmazonLKChristmasMedley

VERSE 1
There’s a thrill in the air, can you feel it?
A feel-good, goodwill kind of season
When the world all comes together
And everything just feels better
I wanna see, wanna see some snowflakes
Feel them fall and melt on my face
So put the books and homework away
’Cause I just wanna bundle up, get outside, and play

CHORUS

Hey! Ho! Christmastime is here
It’s my favorite time of year

VERSE 2
I wanna make, wanna make a snowman
Have a snowball fight, throw as fast as I can
So put the books and homework away
’Cause I just wanna bundle up, get outside, and play 
All day!

CHORUS 2
Hey! Ho! I love Christmas
Hey! Ho! Christmastime is here
It’s my favorite time of year

BRIDGE
I’ve been waiting all year for Christmas Day
You know I’ve been good for goodness’ sake
Got lights on the tree and cookies on the plate
Bible story time by the fire feels great
I just wanna hear those sleigh bells ring
Say oooOOOH!

CHORUS 3
Hey! Ho! I love Christmas
Hey! Ho! Christmastime is here
It’s my favorite time of year

When night has fallen
When fear is common
Still You’re calling me
When faith is lost and
My hope exhausted
You will be my strength

God You’re enough
For me

You won’t give up on me

I feel it breaking out like an echo
Your love is holding on, and it won’t let go
I feel it breaking out like an echo
Echo in my soul
Soul

You keep repeating
Promises to me
Now there’s no stopping
What You have started
Till it is complete

Families, worship God and have fun together as you sing and dance to YOUR LOVE IS by eKidz! It’s one of our favorite Christian songs for kids here at LifeKids! Whether your kids are 2 or 10, they'll love this full lyric video with active dance moves.

YOUR LOVE IS LYRICS
by EKIDZ

VERSE 1
Like a wave, You are breaking
Full of hope, crashing over us

VERSE 2
Like a flood, You are rushing
With a grace washing over us

CHORUS
So incredible, unconditional
Your love is, Your love is
Free for everyone, generational
Your love is, Your love is

VERSE 3
In Your light, We’re surrounded
Now we shine, all for You alone

VERSE 4
Brought to life for Your glory
Let our hearts beat for You alone

BRIDGE
Never failing, I can’t get enough
Of Your love, Your love
Ever-faithful, there is more than enough
Of Your love, Your love

by EKIDZ

VERSE 1
Love so incredible
Unexplainable

Creator of the world

You know my beginning and my end
You love me like I’m one in a million

And You made my heart

Guided by Your hand
My life is meaningful

Now I’m finally living

There’s no fear in love

Running to the promise
There’s no fear in love

You know my beginning and my end
You love me like I’m one in a million

videos.description:
Kids, we get to give our lives to Jesus! Worship Him together with your family for being a trusted leader we can all follow. He is our help, He is our hope, He is our strength!

Families, worship God and have fun together as you sing and dance to GET TO GIVE by eKidz! It’s one of our favorite Christian songs for kids here at LifeKids! Whether your kids are 2 or 10, they'll love this full lyric video with active dance moves.

SUBSCRIBE to LifeKids for weekly videos: https://go2.lc/LKYTsubscribe

GET TO GIVE LYRICS
by EKIDZ

VERSE 1
I lift my eyes to the heavens
Where my help comes from
My hope is found in You, Jesus
You’re my strength alone

PRE-CHORUS
I surrender all, all, all whoooa
I surrender all, all, all whoooa

CHORUS
I give my life
I get to give my life to You
I live my life
I get to live my life for You
And it’s all, it’s all, it’s all for You
And it’s all, it’s all, it’s all for You

VERSE 2
Where You go, I will follow
You’re never far away
I will trust in You, Jesus
You’re my everything

videos.title: The Very First Christmas | OFFICIAL MUSIC VIDEO | Bible Story | LifeKids
videos.description:
Celebrate Christmas as a family with this animated kids music video that tells the story of the very first Christmas! 

If you’ve heard it once or you’ve heard it, like, a million gazillion times--whenever you think about it, it will blow your mind!

Read this story in your Bible: 
Luke 2
https://www.bible.com/110/LUK.2 

LYRICS:

VERSE 1
A long, long time ago
In a place called Nazareth
An angel came to a special girl 
And said, “Hey Mary, get this!”
You’re gonna have a baby boy
And you’re gonna name Him Jesus
He’s gonna be the Savior 
Of the world
Pretty neat, huh?
Pretty neat, huh? Pretty neat!

CHORUS 
And she was all like
Whoa! That just blew my mind
Can you tell it to me one more time?
Count me in
Yeah, that sounds amazing
Hey! Did you just say
The Son of God is on his way
And He’s coming as a little baby?
Yep! That’s right
Whoa! That just blew my mind

VERSE 2
Now this is Joseph 
“Sup?” 
He’s Mary’s dude 
The angel came and 
Talked to him too
Saying, “Hit the road,
You gotta pack up and go
To Beth-le-hem”
So they saddled up their donkey, but
When they got to Bethlehem 
There was no place to stay
Yeah, there was no room at the inn

CHORUS 
And they were like
Whoa! That just blows my mind
Mary stopped and said, “It's time!”
She gave birth to Jesus 
And laid Him in a manger of
Hay—like, literal hay
Was everywhere
All in their face
But it was perfect
Yeah, the Savior had come

BRIDGE 
And just when you thought 
It couldn’t get any better
Some angels appeared 
To nearby shepherds 
They filled the sky 
All singing together 
“Peace on earth!”

CHORUS 
And all the shepherds were like
Whoa! That just blew my mind
Let’s go see with our own eyes
The baby Jesus
Let’s spread the Good News
Then guess what
What?
Eight days later
Anna and Simeon met their Savior
At the temple God’s promise 
Had finally come true

INTERLUDE
Phew!
That’s all that happened, right?
Uhhh …

VERSE 3
No! Then three wisemen came
Traveling from far away
Following a brightly shining 
Star in the sky
Plus! They brought fancy gifts
Like gold and myrrh 
And frankincense 
But honestly some diapers 
Would’ve been just fine

OUTRO
So that’s the story 
Of the very first Christmas
And just like everything it’s all about
It’s all about Jesus
Yeah!
If you’ve heard it once
Or you’ve heard it like 
A million gazillion times
Whenever you think about it
It will blow your mind like
Whooooooa!

DO IT AGAIN LYRICS
By EKIDZ 

VERSE 1
Walking around these walls
I thought by now they’d fall
But You have never failed me yet
Waiting for change to come
Knowing the battle’s won
For You have never failed me yet

CHORUS 1
Your promise still stands
Great is your faithfulness
Faithfulness
I’m still in Your hands
This is my confidence
You’ve never failed me yet

VERSE 2
I know the night won’t last
Your word will come to pass
My heart will sing Your praise again
Jesus, You’re still enough
Keep me within Your love
My heart will sing Your praise again

CHORUS 2
Your promise still stands
Great is your faithfulness
Faithfulness
I’m still in Your hands
This is my confidence
You never fail
Your promise still stands
Great is Your faithfulness
Faithfulness
I’m still in Your hands
This is my confidence
You’ve never failed me yet

BRIDGE
I’ve seen You move
You move the mountains
And I believe
I’ll see You do it again
You made a way
Where there was no way
And I believe
I’ll see You do it again

videos.title: FOR YOUR GLORY | Worship at Home With LifeKids
videos.description:
Kids, it’s time to sing, sing, sing at the top of your lungs! Shout it: Jesus! He is the One! Dance, dance, dance because of God’s love with your family! 

Families, worship God and have fun together as you sing and dance to FOR YOUR GLORY by eKidz! It’s one of our favorite Christian songs for kids here at LifeKids! Whether your kids are 2 or 10, they'll love this full lyric video with active dance moves.

SUBSCRIBE to LifeKids for weekly videos: https://go2.lc/LKYTsubscribe

FOR YOUR GLORY LYRICS
By EKIDZ

VERSE 1
There is freedom in Your name
We will never be the same
We are alive, we are alive in You
There is power in Your name
In our weakness You’re our strength
We are alive, we are alive in You

CHORUS
We will sing, sing, sing at the top of our lungs
We will shout it, Jesus, You are the one
We will dance, dance, dance because of Your love
We sing and we shout and we dance for Your glory
We sing and we shout and we dance for Your glory

VERSE 2
There is freedom in Your name
We will never be the same
We are alive, we are alive in you
There is power in Your name
In our weakness You’re our strength
We are alive, we are alive in You

BRIDGE
There is freedom, freedom
There is hope unending
In You Jesus, Jesus
We sing and we shout and we dance

videos.title: Alive Forever (The Easter Story) | OFFICIAL MUSIC VIDEO | Bible Story | LifeKids
videos.description:
Jesus is alive forever! Celebrate Easter as a family with this animated kids music video that tells the Easter story.

LISTEN TO MORE:
Spotify: https://go2.lc/LifeKidsSpotify
Apple Music: https://go2.lc/LifeKidsAppleMusic
YouTube Music: https://go2.lc/LifeKidsYouTubeMusic
Amazon Music: https://go2.lc/LifeKidsAmazonMusic

Read this story in your Bible: 
John 19-20
https://www.bible.com/110/JHN.19     
https://www.bible.com/110/JHN.20  

LYRICS:

VERSE 1
Jesus helped God make the world
He loved us from the start
His heart broke when we chose to sin
’Cause that tore us apart

So Jesus left His Father’s side
To live with us on earth 
His whole life Jesus never sinned
As He healed and shared God’s Word

CHORUS 1
What an amazing grace
Jesus came to save
Helping people who were sick and hurting
He did miracles and He’s still working
I’m so amazed
’Cause Jesus came to save

VERSE 2
But Jesus died upon a cross
He did it all for us
A crown of thorns placed on His head
’Cause He loved us so much

CHORUS 2
What an amazing grace
That Jesus came to save
Follow Jesus it’s a great decision
Put your faith in Him and be forgiven
I’m so amazed
’Cause Jesus came to save

VERSE 3
But on day three the stone that sealed 
His tomb was rolled away
His body nowhere to be found
He rose to life again

CHORUS 3
What an amazing grace
Jesus came to save
He made a way for us to be together
Now Jesus is alive forever
I’m so amazed
’Cause Jesus came
Yes I’m so amazed
’Cause Jesus came
Yes I’m so-oh-oh amazed
’Cause Jesus came to save

videos.title: Kitties and Doggies (Jesus Loves Me) | OFFICIAL MUSIC VIDEO | LifeKids
videos.description:
Worship Jesus as a family while you sing along with your favorite animals! If you're looking for music for kids, this official lyric video from LifeKids and Bible Adventure Worship is for you!

LYRICS

VERSE 1
God made all the kitties
Meow, meow
God made all the doggies
Arf, arf
God made all the fish swimmin’ in the deep blue sea
Blub blub blub blub blub blub
God made all the birds flying high
Ca-caw
He made lizards and snakes and crocodiles
But best of all God made me

VERSE 2
Jesus loves the kitties
Meow, meow
Jesus loves the doggies
Arf, arf
Jesus loves the fish swimmin’ in the deep blue sea
Blub blub blub blub blub blub
Jesus loves the birds flying high
Ca-caw
He loves lizards and snakes and crocodiles
But best of all Jesus loves me
 
BRIDGE
C’mon let’s sing like kitties
Meow, meow, meow, meow, meow, meow, meow
Meow, meow, meow, meow, meow, meow, meow
Meow, meow, meow, meow, meow, meow, meow
Meow, meow, meow, meow, meow, meow, meow

Now let’s sing like doggies
Arf, arf, arf, arf, arf, arf, arf
Arf, arf, arf, arf, arf, arf, arf
Arf, arf, arf, arf, arf, aaawooo
Arf, arf, arf, arf, arf, arf, arf

Alright now let’s sing like a fish
Blub, blub, blub, blub, blub, blub, blub
Blub, blub, blub, blub, blub, blub, blub
Blub, blub, blub, blub, blub, blub, blub
Blub, blub, blub, blub, blub, blub, blub

Now let’s get all the animals together 
For a great big sing-a-long

CHORUS
Jesus loves me this I know
For the Bible tells me so
Little ones to Him belong
They are weak but He is strong

Jesus loves me this I know
For the Bible tells me so
